name: Scrap Resurrection
description:
A 2D side-scrolling action game in which you switch characters to progress. 

Made in a couple weeks as the second project for a college course. Missing a lot of content and art, but an interesting idea and base implementation.

This version is a prototype that's missing a lot of sound, levels, enemies, etc. I may come back to this in the future (and likely remake it in Unity, which won't take long).

Credits

Dan Harvey - Art, Level Design, Story

Sophie Hayward - Character Art

Mattie - Everything else

Software

GameMaker (source code), Audacity, Aseprite, Photoshop
